plot: Marianne's magic gift is abused by her father to make money. But today there is, just maybe, a glimpse of a chance to escape this tragic doom loop once and for all.
title: Brù-Cé-Kaé!
plot_es: Marianne's magic gift is abused by her father to make money. But today there is, just maybe, a glimpse of a chance to escape this tragic doom loop once and for all.
plot_en: Marianne's magic gift is abused by her father to make money. But today there is, just maybe, a glimpse of a chance to escape this tragic doom loop once and for all.
